mainTitle: Discover how to engage and help our planet
aboutUsDescription: Plastic Bubble was born with the aim of uniting people and communities to projects that aim to minimize the impact of plastic on our environment, and that contribute to helping them develop in a sustainable way.
ourMission: Connect and mobilize people and organizations with sustainable actions that generate positive impacts on the environment through the reduction of plastic waste.
descriptionOne: It seeks to involve civil society, the private sector and government in the sustainable solution to a global problem.
descriptionTwo: The importance of waste pickers and cooperatives to combat problems related to the generation and disposal of waste.
descriptionThree: With ethics and honesty, respecting the local culture, we engage and seek to raise awareness among the Brazilian population in the irregular disposal of urban waste, soil contamination and pollution of the waters of rivers and oceans through transparent communication.
descriptionFour: About the threat that excessive waste production and its incorrect disposal mean to the planet, animals, fish and birds.
descriptionFive: It seeks to involve civil society, the private sector and government in the sustainable solution to a global problem.

project1Description: The program encourages people to collect all sorts of plastic lids and then donates the money from the sale...
project2Description: The overall objective of the project is to reduce the amount of plastic in the ocean by protecting the estuarine mangrove.
project3Description: Its purpose is to collect and sell plastic caps for recycling and all income will go towards neutering dogs...
